Player History
Signed as a free agent by California on 4/1/1985 to a 1-year deal worth $1,060,000 per year...
Signed as a free agent by Los Angeles on 4/3/1985 to a 1-year deal worth $956,000 per year...
Had first career hit on 4/4/1985, off Tom Browning (CIN)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/6/1985, off Danny Cox (STL)...
Had 5 hits with 3 RBI against St. Louis on 5/9/1986...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/25/1986, hitting .476 with 5 HR, 6 RBI...
2/2/1987: Gets a new one-year contract worth $2,750,000 through salary arbitration...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/31/1987, hitting .474 with 3 HR, 6 RBI...
2/2/1988: Gets a new one-year contract worth $3,600,000 through salary arbitration...
Had 5 hits with 1 RBI against Chicago on 5/26/1988...
Was selected to the 1988 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/4/1988, hitting .591 with 2 HR, 5 RBI...
Won World Series with Los Angeles in 1988...
2/2/1989: Gets a new one-year contract worth $4,028,571 through salary arbitration...
5/26/1989: Signed a contract extension with Los Angeles, $5,800,000 per year, for 4 years.
Was selected to the 1989 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/7/1989, hitting .533 with 3 HR, 13 RBI...
Was selected to the 1991 Allstar game...
Won Batter of the Month award on 10/1/1991, hitting .429 with 8 HR, 30 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/29/1992, hitting .474 with 5 HR, 12 RBI...
Was selected to the 1992 Allstar game...
Injured on 8/3/1992 with a Pulled Hamstring Muscle, out for one week...
